item.description: Very nice 4 mile walk around the pond. This area is part of the Blue Hills Reservation. Most of the trail is flat but there is a small five minute section that is rocky and hilly. Wear good shoes. There are a few pond and a nice small beach area where the dogs will get wet so bring along a towel. The entrance to the parking lot is on Randolph Street, next to Temple Beth David (1060 Randolph Street, Canton). It is well hidden in the trees and is not well marked.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Weekday Morning at Ponkapoag Pond
